comments.content:
Just try something like:
var a = 1;

Then run:
D:\Projetos\ccide\library\compiler>java -jar compiler.jar --js=test.js --compute_phase_ordering

You will need wait about 10 seconds then...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.RuntimeException: unexpected exception
        at com.google.javascript.jscomp.AbstractCommandLineRunner$RunTimeStats.outputBestPhaseOrdering(Unknown Source)
        at com.google.javascript.jscomp.AbstractCommandLineRunner$RunTimeStats.access$2300(Unknown Source)
        at com.google.javascript.jscomp.AbstractCommandLineRunner.run(Unknown Source)
        at com.google.javascript.jscomp.CommandLineRunner.main(Unknown Source)
                Caused by: java.io.IOException: Stream closed
        at java.io.BufferedWriter.ensureOpen(Unknown Source)
        at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source)
        at java.io.Writer.write(Unknown Source)
        at java.io.Writer.append(Unknown Source)
        at java.io.Writer.append(Unknown Source)
        ... 4 more

I don't know what do this param, but it don't works. :/

We should fix this and make it a hidden option. It isn't generally useful, it runs the compile multiple times changing the order of the optimization passes and compares the results to determine what the optimal ordering is for the input.
This issue was closed by revision r989.
